text.text_translated:
You may dream about a phone call from an old friend.
Or you may dream about the death of someone close.
You may think the dream shows the future.
But it is not the future.
It is more likely just chance.
We also dream about these events many times.
But they do not happen.
We probably choose to forget those times.
